verses.verse: And he <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> to <S%H7853>resist<s%> him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> thee, O <S%H7854>Satan;<s%> even the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> thee: is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> a <S%H181>brand<s%> <S%H5337>plucked<s%> out of the <S%H4480>fire?<s%> <S%H784><s%>

And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> those that <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6674>filthy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him. And <S%H413>unto<s%> him he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have caused thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, and I will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> thee with change of <S%H4254>raiment.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said,<s%> Let them <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H2889>fair<s%> <S%H6797>miter<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head.<s%> So they <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H2889>fair<s%> <S%H6797>miter<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> him with <S%H899>garments.<s%> And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> stood <S%H5975>by.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> thou wilt <S%H1980>walk<s%> in my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4931>charge,<s%> then <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1777>judge<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and shalt <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853>my<s%> <S%H2691>courts,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee places to <S%H4108>walk<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> that <S%H5975>stand<s%> by.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> O <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H7453>fellows<s%> that <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H4159>wondered<s%> at: <S%H3588>for,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will bring <S%H935>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> the <S%H6780>BRANCH.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H5414>laid<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua;<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H6605>engrave<s%> the <S%H6603>graving<s%> thereof, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and I will <S%H4185>remove<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> shall ye <S%H7121>call<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H413>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H1612>vine<s%> and <S%H413>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the fig <S%H8384>tree.<s%>
